name: @scc/subgraph
description: GraphQL indexer for the SCC protocol.

scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 scc/scc-protocol --version-label v0.0.1
scripts.recreate:local: (graph remove --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ scc/scc-protocol || true) && graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ scc/scc-protocol
scripts.deploy:local:full: pnpm run prepare:subgraph && pnpm run recreate:local && pnpm run deploy:local
